rules_text:
When Street Swarm Elder enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens. If Street Swarm Elder escaped, create two 3/3 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens instead. 
Escape–{5}{G}{G}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
